definitions.definition: A polypeptide hormone that regulates carbohydrate metabolism (in various animals including humans).
Any exogenous preparation of this hormone for use as a medication .
Any exogenous preparation of this hormone or its analogues for use as a medication .

main_definition: A polypeptide hormone that regulates carbohydrate metabolism (in various animals including humans).
secondary_definitions: Any exogenous preparation of this hormone for use as a medication .
( loosely ) Any exogenous preparation of this hormone or its analogues for use as a medication .
